desc: Full-stack Ecosystem (Mobile & Web) for bar management published on the App Store.
Mobile App developed with Expo 54 and Expo Router, using Reanimated for fluid animations (60fps) and Context API.
Robust Serverless Backend with Firebase Cloud Functions orchestrating secure payments (Pix/Card) via Pagar.me.
Advanced features: Native QR Code scanning, theme persistence, and real-time synchronization via Firestore.
Web Administrative Panel (React + Vite) for complete menu management and live order monitoring.
Voice-controlled 'Local-First' smart assistant for complex task automation.
ReAct Agent Architecture with LangChain and Ollama (Mistral) to interpret voice commands and manipulate spreadsheets.
Custom data persistence and automated list formatting sent directly to WhatsApp.
Modular Deep Learning framework for training and evaluating Facial Emotion Recognition (FER) models.
Flexible architecture supporting multiple datasets (FER2013, RAF-DB, ExpW) and backbones (ResNet, DenseNet).
Implementation of advanced pipelines: Test-Time Augmentation (TTA) and automated statistical error analysis.
'From scratch' implementation of a Genetic Algorithm (GA) for feature selection optimization on Breast Cancer dataset.
Adaptive Mutation and Elitism strategies to maximize KNN classifier accuracy.
Result: 93.86% accuracy using only 6 features (80% reduction in dimensionality), outperforming the baseline.
Robust Full-stack platform for trading digital assets (CS2 Skins), developed with MVC architecture.
RESTful Backend in Node.js/Express with JWT authentication and complex relationship management in SQL database.
Modern and reactive Frontend optimized with TailwindCSS and relational database integration.
Implementation of competitive autonomous agents for zero-sum games (5x5 Tic-Tac-Toe).
Comparative performance analysis between standard Minimax and Alpha-Beta Pruning.
Algorithmic optimization resulting in exponential reduction of visited nodes and decision time.
Mapping of streaming collaborations with a dataset of +80k entities.
Manual implementation of data structures and graph algorithms (MST, Centrality) without external libraries.
Focus on performance optimization for processing large data volumes.
